description:
When Cocoa sees Chino using caffè-de-mancy to tell fortunes with coffee, she has Chino teach her how to do it, then tries telling fortunes for Chino, Lize, and Tippy. After that, for some reason, all sorts of bad luck befalls Cocoa...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les porte-bonheur sont les légumes, le crime et la punition
Lucky Item wa Yasai to Tsumi to Batsu
Your Lucky Items Are Vegetables, Crime, and Punishment
ラッキーアイテムは野菜と罪と罰
